title: Rosenblatt Downgrades Apple (AAPL)
text: Fintel reports that on August 4, 2023, Rosenblatt downgraded their outlook for Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) from Buy to Neutral.

title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Stocks Lose Ground as Hiring Slows
text: The S&P 500 fell 0.5% on Friday, Aug. 4, 2023, after the Labor Department's latest jobs report showed the pace of hiring slowed.

title: Apple shares fall most since Sept. 2022 after third quarter earnings report
text: Apple's earnings beat soft expectations on both profit and revenue, but overall sales declined 1% as iPhone, iPad, and Mac sales flagged.

title: Apple Crushes Quarter Once Again
text: During Apple Inc.'s ( AAPL , Financial) fiscal third-quarter earnings call on Aug. 3, CEO Tim Cook and Chief Financial Officer Luca Maestri discussed factors that impacted the company's performance.

title: Amazon, Apple, Airbnb, Starbucks, Ferrari and other earnings that moved markets this week
Apple's stock trend is no longer its friend
text: The selloff in Apple Inc.'s stock Friday was enough for chart watchers to refer to it as a breakdown, as it confirmed the break of a trendline that has defined the stock's rally since the start of the year.

title: Apple's (AAPL) Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Decline Y/Y
text: Apple's (AAPL) third-quarter fiscal 2023 results suffer from forex headwind and challenging macro environment conditions, despite Services growth.

title: Markets Higher Midday After Upbeat Earnings, July Jobs Report
text: U.S. equities were higher at midday on Friday, Aug. 4, 2023 on the back of strong earnings reports, while a cooler-than-expected July jobs report raised optimism the Fed could ease back on its campaign of rate hikes to cool inflation.

title: Apple Stock Lacks Catalysts, Says Analyst. U.S. Slowdown 'Likely to Last.
text: Rosenblatt analyst Barton Crockett downgraded iPhone maker Apple to Neutral from Buy, but kept a $198 target price on shares after fiscal-third-quarter earnings.

title: July Jobs Cool to 187K, Unemployment Drops to 3.5%
text: Year over year, hourly wages remain elevated at +4.4%, 20 basis points (bps) higher than analysts were looking for.

title: ETFs in Focus Post Apple's Q3 Earnings and Revenue Beat
text: Apple Inc. (AAPL) reported solid third-quarter fiscal 2023 results, wherein it beat estimates on both earnings and revenues. However, the tech titan forecast another revenue decline for the current quarter, spreading fears of pessimism.

title: Apple Stock Dinged by Lackluster iPhone Sales
text: While Wall Street cheers sector peer Amazon.com (AMZN)  for its upbeat corporate report, Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) was last seen 3.1% lower to trade at $185.35.

title: Apple Support Levels On A Pullback (Technical Analysis)
text: Apple Inc.'s price will shrink with market bites, it is looking for support. The support level that holds depends on portfolio managers' willingness to start buying again. The first test of support should be at $186, with a potential target of $178-$180 for the post-earnings pullback.

title: Apple loses its $3T market value as stock dips over lack of iPhone demand
text: Apple CEO Tim Cook blamed "foreign exchange headwinds" on disappointing sales of Apple's most prized money maker, the iPhone.

title: Amazon's stock is now a better play than Apple's, according to this analyst
text: Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +11.20% and Apple Inc. AAPL, -2.78% each reported earnings Thursday, and those results prompted Rosenblatt Securities analyst Barton Crockett to change his tune on both names. He upgraded Amazon's stock to buy from neutral after earnings, while making the reverse move on shares of Apple.

title: Apple weakness is buying opportunity ahead of new iPhone launch - broker
text: Investors should take the opportunity to buy Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) shares whilst the broader market is taking a harsh view of the iPhone maker, that's the view of California-headquartered stockbroker Wedbush. Apple shares softened, losing US$6.50 or 3.4% per share on Friday, after the company reported a 1% decrease in total revenue to $81.8 billion for the quarter ending in June, marking the third consecutive year-on-year decline.

title: Apple shares slide after it reports decreased hardware revenue
text: Shares of Apple were down Friday morning after the company reported lower year-over-year revenue for its flagship products in its third quarter.

title: "Big Tech" Earnings Review: ETFs in Focus
text: Among the top five big tech stocks, Amazon, Facebook-parent Meta and Google-parent Alphabet delivered impressive results, garnering positive reactions from investors, while Apple and Microsoft disappointed investors.

title: 5 Forever Dividend Stocks
text: When it comes to investing, it is important to build a strong foundation of high-quality positions. Today we will look at 5 dividend stocks that I consider foundational positions due in part to their consistency over the years. All 5 dividend stocks have shown their ability to generate strong amounts of free cash flow, maintain debt levels, and return money back to shareholders on a consistent basis.

title: Everyone's Watching These 2 Stocks Friday Morning
text: Markets inched higher in premarket trading. Amazon's stock got a big boost as both its e-commerce and cloud infrastructure businesses performed well.

title: Apple's Q3 Earnings Were Deceptively Good Despite Hardware Weakness
text: Apple's earnings report showed weakness in hardware but strength in services. Services segment saw record sales and beat estimates, growing 8% YoY. Despite hardware weakness, there are compelling reasons to buy Apple stock, including optimism for the coming iPhone 15 cycle.

title: 1 'Magnificent Seven' Stock Has Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Betting Big
text: Berkshire Hathaway has 46% of its $328 billion portfolio invested in Apple stock. Apple benefits from immense brand authority, a competitive advantage that translates into consumer loyalty and pricing power.

title: Apple's services business now has more than 1B subscribers
text: The company's services portfolio comprises iCloud, Music, Fitness+, Pay, Apple Card, and Apple TV+, and it added 150M subscribers over the past 12 months.

title: Apple's slowdown era rages on, and the iPhone may not be enough to power its stock
text: At least one analyst saw fit to move to a more cautious stance on the name in the wake of Apple's AAPL, -0.73% latest report, which brought the third quarter in a row of revenue declines and commentary suggesting another could be on the way.

title: Apple loses record three-trillion-dollar valuation
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) is expected to relinquish its US$3 trillion market valuation when US markets open today, with shares expected to open 2.5% lower at US$186.3. Despite rising profits and digital services clients surpassing one billion globally, the market appears spooked over falling revenues at the Silicon Valley behemoth.

title: Apple, Samsung could be hit by India laptop and PC import restrictions
text: Laptops and tablets are among a handful of electronics that will require a license to be imported into India, according to a government notice.

title: Trading Game Plan: Jobs report, AAPL & AMZN earnings, day trades, swing trades and trading education - August 04, 2023
text: (Kitco News) - In today's action-packed session of the Game Plan LIVE on YouTube, Gareth Soloway will offer a full overview key charts and data sets across all markets. This includes a look at the Jobs Report, AAPL & AMZN Earnings, Day Trades, Swing Trades and Trading Education.

title: Apple Earnings Beat Estimates as Service Revenue Offsets iPhone Sales Drag
text: Apple reported better-than-expected services revenue in Q3 2023, helping boost net income even as falling iPhone sales led to a third straight quarter of net product revenue declines.

title: 5 Things to Know Before Markets Open
text: Job growth is projected to slow and Amazon shares are soaring after the ecommerce giant blew by analyst revenue expectations. Here's what investors need to know today.

title: Huawei plots China smartphone revival with mobile operating system upgrade
text: Huawei launched its upgraded mobile operating system and an enhanced AI assistant on Friday.

title: Amazon shares pop but Apple's dip, and other movers
text: Amazon.com Inc.‘s stock AMZN, +0.55% jumped more than 8% after the retail juggernaut blew past second-quarter expectations, with strong e-commerce and cloud sales.

title: Amazon Shines During Apple's Off-Season
text: One tech titan snaps its growth slump, while the other remains mired in it.

title: Helped By Strong Services Growth, Apple Earnings Just Returned to Growth
text: Apple's earnings per share for fiscal Q3 came in well ahead of analysts' average forecast. Revenue fell slightly year over year but increased when adjusted to exclude the impact of foreign exchange.

title: Apple Faces iPhone Headwinds. Why Analysts Are Nervous About the Stock.
text: After Apple's third consecutive quarter of declining revenue, some Wall Street analysts say its valuation is looking stretched.

title: Warren Buffett Has Bought Shares of This Company for 19 Consecutive Quarters -- and No, It's Not Apple
text: Since taking over as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway in the mid-1960s, Buffett has doubled-up the average annual total return of the benchmark S&P 500. Some of the Oracle of Omaha's top investment ideas at the moment include tech stock Apple and energy company Occidental Petroleum.

title: U.S. stock futures rise ahead of jobs report and mixed reaction to Amazon and Apple results
text: U.S. stock futures rose Friday ahead of the key jobs report, as traders gave a mixed reception to results from Amazon.com and Apple.

title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway closes in on record high as its Apple stake and brighter outlook cheer investors
text: Berkshire Hathaway stock closed at a 16-month high, and within touching distance of a new record. Warren Buffett's company boasts a $175 billion stake in Apple, and benefits from a better economy.

title: Amazon and Apple beat earnings forecasts as they polish AI skills
text: Amazon and Apple on Thursday reported earnings that topped market expectations, aiming for even better days ahead with the help of artificial intelligence (AI).
